trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around February 20th 1987
Summary: golden rods,cylindrical,9 in all first eight.One dropped out of group,waited for last one then rejoined group, last one joined group.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking out my window listening to music when I observed a group of eight rods then one more when the one more joined the group.They were three abreast with two in the last row.The eighth one stopped and left the group,stayed still in place then rejoined the group.The ninth then flew to join the group seconds later.They were 20 feet above my head,I was 40 feet up in my apartment when I observed them.They were cylinder shaped and gold in color,looking like golden shards of light.The eighth one stopped to wait for the ninth rod to catch up with the group then when it saw the ninth rod catching up the eighth rejoined the group.That was over 20 years ago and I haven't seen anything like it since,I do believe they were alive.I was not afraid but fascinated they were a true wonder and I would like to see thm again!
